Html:
The Return Codes table is unavailable from revise menu with WPP 1.3.1702.10. WPP 1.3.1603.29 works fine.

Publishing a new update table is available.

No error, just show "MSI and MSP files has their own return codes."

Thanks,

I noticed this as well while following the custom update guide for deploying / uninstalling Java. I was still able to deploy the update, but I am curious to know what the repercussions are for not being able to specify the return code info?
